ai-atk-abh03a50:1_0: Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
ai-atk-abh03a50:2_0: Having taught the Dhamma, the pure one who drinks (of people),
ai-atk-abh03a50:3_0: the meaning of the teaching, which is profound and hard,
ai-atk-abh03a50:4_0: The Great Seer, the supreme hermitage,
ai-atk-abh03a50:5_0: with the cessation of mind and body, the cessation of mind and body,
ai-atk-abh03a50:6_0: He preached the Dhamma of the Ambaṇḍamba,
ai-atk-abh03a50:7_0: Now, in the appearance of his fame, is the colour of his gold coin.
ai-atk-abh03a50:8_0: That’s why I shall listen to him.
